import React from "react"; import "../ItemDetailContainer/itemDetail.css" import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const ItemDetail =({detalles})=>{ const imagen= detalles.images || [] const productId = detalles.id return(
{detalles.description}

{detalles.title}

${detalles.price} Pesos.

Rating: {detalles.rating}

) } export default ItemDetail
